items.sentence: How would you feel if you told Tom that you loved him, but he told you that he didn't love you?
I've just written a letter that I'd like to send. Now, I all I need is an envelope and a stamp.
I stopped at the butcher shop near the post office and bought a couple of steaks for the grill.
I think all the coffee I've been drinking in the afternoon is why I haven't been sleeping well.
I understand French fairly well when I read it, but I have trouble understanding spoken French.
